stories.title: Install WSL with a single command now available in Windows 10 and 11

stories.text:
For an academic survey researchers from University of Zurich (Switzerland) and Eindhoven University of Technology (The Netherlands) are looking for software developers (OSS contributors or working on a closed-source code) who are currently doing code reviews. If you are one, please consider participating in this survey.

We aim to identify what skills developers need for efficient code reviews and how to help developers improve their personal code review practice. This survey takes approximately 15-20 minutes and is fully anonymized.

The survey can be accessed here: https://www.uzh.ch/zi/cl/umfragen/index.php/657931?lang=en
stories.title: Academic survey: Skills required to perform a code review
